评论详情: I love everything about this cardigan!  As the owner of an orange cat, I had to have this!  I love the thickness, the pattern, and the length.  The fit is also perfect!  Hope to enjoy this for a long time!

Love the sweater! It is quiet warm and cozy!

评论概述: Cute sweater but shrunk in wash!!!!
评论详情: Super cute sweater but it shrunk in the washer! Thankfully it still fit my daughter who wears a size XS we ordered a size small. Washed on cold with a light heat dryer and still shrunk. I would suggest hang drying and to size up. Not worth the $40 price point either more like $25!!! My daughter is happy that’s all that matters.

I gave this sweater to my mom as a gift, and she loves it!  It's different from the other sweaters she has and the pattern is so cute.  It runs true to size - I ordered my mom (5' 0', 130 lbs) a Small and it fit perfectly.The background is an ivory color that blends well with white or cream shirts.

Very cute, fun sweater. But it is not very well made. After a few wears, and only 2 gentle washes, laying flat to dry, the sweater is very fuzzy, pilling, and most of the buttons are loose already. The quality is disappointing for the price point.
Got so many compliments, this was a great buy.

Just like others said, the knit is soft and the colors vibrant. I ordered the recommended size and it fits just slightly oversized, perfect I think. It has a deep v and falls down to the top of my legs. Cannot wait to wear it.

Love it!!  So many compliments.  Get it for your cat lover in your life!

This sweater is so cute it makes me smile every time I put it on. It looks high quality as the cats go all the way around the sweater and they are knitted in, not a print. I pair it with a mustard color tank that I got from Amazon Essentials. Perfect color match. The fit is more form fitting (true to size) so if you want oversized or slouchy, then definitely size up. I wash it on delicate and lay flat to dry. I wore it on Thanksgiving and got a spot of soy sauce on it. I was worried, but it came right out!
It seems to be a hit with my friend!
I love wearing this beautiful sweater!  It reminds me of my cat.
Super cute sweater. Soft material and heavy for cold days  fit is generous

Ordered as a gift & my friend loved it. It’s cozy & definitely oversized. It’s midweight and fits well. Seems to be good quality & a good value.

I have had this sweater for 5 months now. I have washed it maybe 5 times, cold water, and lay flat to dry. The sweater has shrunk up quit a bit, by the length only. Instead of hitting below the butt, which it originally did, it sits about waist length. The sweater is so thick and boxy that it gives it a very bulky look. It is also starting to look like it's shedding. I don't see any fabric coming off, but it looks very fuzzy right now. In other words, this sweater does not wash well.

I first saw this sweater a couple of years ago out in the wild and thought I had to have it. The sweater itself is soft, but bulky and feels like it would definitely shrink once washed. Returned it immediately

The sleeves were strangely short for how long the body was. The fabric felt soft at first then once on it was so itchy. It was one of those purchases that I thought could be weird cute but ended up just being weird. Ultimately I returned it.

The cardigan was clearly previously worn and returned. It was covered in long dark hair and was already pilling everywhere. It also had a few stains near the shoulders. I’m very disappointed and will be returning the item immediately.

So probably go a size up. Seriously adorable if you like that cottagecore look, or if you simply want to wear it with leggings and a shirt underneath. Very versatile in my opinion.
